the card has been sold

For sale: T204 Miller Huggins SGC 40 [S]$575 ppd[/S].  Some wear to the front and on the borders.  Back is clean.  Not the strongest VG example, so the price reflects that. Any form of payment (including PayPal) is okay.  PM me or send an email to [url]bill@t207.com[/url].  Thanks.

[IMG]http://t207.com/images/sale/t204/t204_huggins_sgc40_both.jpg[/IMG]
